channel.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands Season 8: Strange Geometries
channel.description:
![EYzMm-HWkAYbDfM|333x500](upload://rrCMVsKY4MbwdXlNWguLmsBrDOH.jpeg) “He said that the geometry of the dream-place he saw was abnormal, non-Euclidean, and loathsomely redolent of spheres and dimensions apart from ours.” H.P. Lovecraft, The Call of Cthulhu
*For the first 48 hours (until 8th September) please only sign up to this game if you have previously been part of the Cogflower Caravan on The Gauntlet.*
Session 1: [date=2020-10-10 time=17:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-10-10 format="LL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZNXtsC52GZCtkPCli Session 2: [date=2020-10-17 time=17:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-10-17 time=20:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZOT_cfG0ersIqqCOU Session 3: [date=2020-10-24 time=17:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-10-24 time=20:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZOpOLA9Dc9ekwFUNs Session 4: [date=2020-10-31 time=17:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] → [date=2020-10-31 time=20:30:00 format="LLLL" timezone="Europe/Amsterdam"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZP8vhj4bzSjbxUZIh
This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City. We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world's most popular RPG. This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree. There will be 4 sessions in October. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using [the X-Card](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SB0jsx34bWHZWbnNIVVuMjhDkrdFGo1_hSC2BWPlI3A/edit) and other safety tools players suggest.

item.title: Ultraviolet Grasslands Season 8: Strange Geometries
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

EYzMm-HWkAYbDfM1280×1920 1.01 MB

“He said that the geometry of the dream-place he saw was abnormal, non-Euclidean, and loathsomely redolent of spheres and dimensions apart from ours.”
H.P. Lovecraft, The Call of Cthulhu

For the first 48 hours (until 8th September) please only sign up to this game if you have previously been part of the Cogflower Caravan on The Gauntlet.

Session 1: Saturday, October 10, 2020 3:30 PM → October 9, 2020 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZNXtsC52GZCtkPCli
Session 2: Saturday, October 17, 2020 3:30 PM → Saturday, October 17, 2020 6:30 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZOT_cfG0ersIqqCOU
Session 3: Saturday, October 24, 2020 3:30 PM → Saturday, October 24, 2020 6:30 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZOpOLA9Dc9ekwFUNs
Session 4: Saturday, October 31, 2020 4:30 PM → Saturday, October 31, 2020 7:30 PM https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MGZP8vhj4bzSjbxUZIh

This is a continuation of the adventures of the Cogflower Caravan on her journey to the Black City.
We will be using Whitehack, a rules lite version of the world’s most popular RPG.
This event is scheduled to run for 3 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
There will be 4 sessions in October. Being able to attend each session is ideal but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html. We will be using the X-Card and other safety tools players suggest.
